A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I did not enjoy Star Wars: The Last Jedi. It felt like a complete disconnect from the original trilogy\, as well as The Force Awakens. The casino subplot was completely unnecessary and such a waste of storytelling. Luke was simply treated as a throw away character. I was bored. I was so bored\, I was on my phone most of the time\, and I LOVE Star Wars. It's such a shame that Star Wars has come to this.
